name: 2720: The Last Mouse On Earth
description:
Mouse thinks she's all alone. But is she?

Explore the landscape, look through telescopes, and collect various items in your quest to discover and make a new Friend. This game is a lot like an interactive story, allowing you to visit several interesting locations and see bits of the narrative unfold in hand-drawn, pixel-art glory.

This is a labor of love made for the Sekret Santa 2019 game event at Glorious Trainwrecks, an inclusive game-creation community on the Internet for 10+ years and counting.

This game is provided at no cost to you, but if you enjoyed it please provide one or more of the following:

  • a kind word in the comments
  • a financial donation of any amount
  • share news about this game with your friends

Your efforts will be appreciated, and it makes the 2 months of off-and-on work invested into this project more worthwhile! Thank you, and enjoy!
